question:
You have decided to leave your current job and look for a new one.
Write a letter to a friend. In your letter,
- explain why you want to leave your current job
- describe what kind of job you are looking for
- ask for some help or advice
text: It has been a long time since we last met. I hope both you and your family are well. Please send my regards to your parents. I miss the delicious cakes that your mom makes for us whenever I visit your home.

I want to let you know that I have made a decision to leave my current job. My current job, as an IT Business Analyst in Healthcare, has been fulfiling, for I can contribute to the community with my knowledge in healthcare IT systems. However, at the same time, I was under extreme stress, as I have to be on standby every day and night.

I will be looking for a job that will let me have my work-life balance back. I want a job that will not require me to think about work after office hours, and will not need me to be on 24/7 standby. I believe that jobs of this nature will be less demanding.
If you know of any available positions for me, please let me know. I will consider and let you know if I'd like to give it a try. Looking forward to hearing from you.
